datasourceConfigModel.description:
This Klip relies on Zapier to update the data source. After adding the Klip you will need to setup this Zap

Note: When you first add this Klip data will not be shown because the data source is empty. The data begins accumulating once you setup the Zap and includes all new mentions that are added after that.
